Drivy is now Getaround
New name, new logo... more possibilities!
Update the app to keep renting shared cars near you, now available to book by the hour.

Enjoying Getaround? Please leave us a review. Your feedback helps to steer us in the right direction!

We regularly update and improve the app to clear any bumps in the road and keep everything running smoothly.

Here's what to expect in the latest update:
- Owners, focus more on your day-to-day activity with owner mode
- Switch to driver mode whenever you need to rent a car
- Compare prices nearby from the car page

*****

Enjoying Getaround? Please leave us a review. Your feedback helps to steer us in the right direction!
